text: It’d be great to have that update :fire:
Does anyone have any meta app ideas that use the HubSpot API? I want to build something using NextJS/React but involve HubSpot in some way.

Maybe a simple “tooling setup” tool for developers?

What I mean is you’ve had a lot of convos with folks about setting up Gulp and SASS etc. Maybe a little web app where you go “I want SASS, I want ______, I want to use the _____ boilerplate” and the tool spits out a zip, and instructs the user to run a command to get the tools all set.

Just throwing it out there because it seemed like something you’ve already kinda done some thinking around.
<@U7SL518D6> thanks, that does sound interesting. I don't think that would require the HubSpot API though
I really need to start using it—huge gap in my knowledge
Fair, I guess it could use the source code API to upload the files as well?

1. Survey app ie <https://www.surveyjs.io/>
2. SMS app using Twilio Connect
3. A set of custom workflow actions <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions>
<@UDHT6N5SM> There's 3 ideas for you. I do love <@U7SL518D6> idea for GULP and SASS, lol.
There’s a source code API?! That’s crazy.
<@UCTAN7RPA> thanks for all the ideas. I’m leaning towards the tools idea just have to think about what’s possible. It needs to be small but useful.
